Module technology.sola.engine
Package technology.sola.engine.defaults

Class SolaWithDefaults

java.lang.Object
technology.sola.engine.core.Sola
technology.sola.engine.defaults.SolaWithDefaults
public abstract class SolaWithDefaults extends Sola
SolaWithDefaults extends Sola with some default behaviors that many games will find useful, such as default physics configurations and rendering options. These can be enabled in the onInit(DefaultsConfigurator) method and configured further via the member instances
  • solaPhysics
  • solaGraphics
  • guiDocument

  • Field Details

    • solaGraphics

      protected SolaGraphics solaGraphics
      The SolaGraphics instance for this Sola. This is null until SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator.useGraphics() is called.

    • solaPhysics

      protected SolaPhysics solaPhysics
      The SolaPhysics instance for this Sola. This is null until SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator.usePhysics() is called.

    • guiDocument

      protected GuiDocument guiDocument
      The GuiDocument instance for this Sola. This is null until SolaWithDefaults.DefaultsConfigurator.useGui() is called.
